title: Messy Bug Returns
description: Our lovable Messy Bug is back! This time, too many people are leaving rubbish everywhere, and poor Tidy Fairy is all worn out. Messy Bug sees her sorrow and decides to help. Can Messy Bug redeem himself and make the world right again? This is the sequel to Messy Bug and is an illustrated story written for children ages 3+. This book will also appeal to older children and environmentally conscious parents.
author: Jenny Colledge
